response.original_title: We Are Experiencing Technical Difficulties. Regular Programming Will Resume Momentarily.
response.overview: "Honouring the tradition of optically-printed films, 'We Are Experiencing ...' is a visual treat that manipulates, combines and recombines to dazzling effect. In this digital age, this optically printed film runs countercurrent to the trends. The film uses repeating imagery such as five autumn's worth of leaves, or the same images repeated, and the effect is mesmerizing." - Liz Czach, Toronto International Film Festival, 1997
response.title: We Are Experiencing Technical Difficulties. Regular Programming Will Resume Momentarily.
